data.text:
@LibertyWiccan @SenEricSchmitt Yup

Red states should reinstitute slavery and build some machine gun and recreational nuclear weapons factories
@howlinghobo0 @SenEricSchmitt Any law contradictory to the constitution is null and void. That's the standard for even passing a law. Government is derived from the consent of the governed.

@SenEricSchmitt I’m old enough to remember when Law Enforcement agreed & understood women not pulling over immediately upon blue flashing lights, but rather driving to a safe place with witnesses b4 stopping.

What are our politicians teaching their children today?
@ElijahC14635277 @SenEricSchmitt And to think this guy used to be the Attorney General in MO. Now he's a pitbull for the Pedo class.......
@SenEricSchmitt If it's called the "Protect America Act" guess what it ISN'T going to do.......
@SenEricSchmitt Law and order must extend to the furthest reaches of DC and to the wealthy and influential or it all falls apart. Talk to Pam Bondi
@SenEricSchmitt We stand for law and order. Even for police and politicians.  No one is above the law.
